front.title: AFS-3 Rx RPC XDR Primitive Type Definitions

abstract.t: AFS-3 embeds a set of XDR primitive type definitions, which are referenced throughout the various AFS-3 protocol specifications. This memo defines the mapping between these AFS-3 primitive types, and the underlying XDR primitives. Internet Draft Comments Comments regarding this draft are solicited. Please include the AFS-3 protocol standardization mailing list (afs3-standardization@openafs.org) as a recipient of any comments. AFS-3 Document State This document is in state "draft", as per the document state definitions set forth in [I-D.wilkinson-afs3-standardisation].
